item.title: JPMorgan forms special advisory group to share some of bank's 'secret sauce' with clients
item.description: They're calling the initiative the "Special Advisory Services," which launches Monday, with Liz Myers, who also serves as global chair of investment b...

item.title: U.S. stocks show little reaction to Trump's extraordinary Venezuela action. Why investors see a bull case
item.description: Geopolitical shocks historically have little impact on the stock market, and, additionally, investors do not expect the attack will escalate further.

item.title: Minneapolis Fed's Kashkari indicates interest rates don't need to be cut much more
item.description: In a CNBC interview, he said the key now is whether the Fed should be more focused on the labor market or inflation.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves premarket: Chevron, Halliburton, QXO, Duolingo & more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves before the bell.

item.title: China decries U.S. action in Venezuela â€” even as it guards billions at stake
item.description: China's immediate priority in the wake of the U.S. attack on Venezuela is to protect economic interests, analysts said.
